content: --अन्वय {%<ab>a.</ab>%} having no progeny, childless. {2} unconnected, unrelated. {3} not agreeing with the context (as a word in a sentence). {4} without logical connection or regular sequence, unmethodical. {5} without being seen, out of sight; <ls>Ms. 8. 332.</ls> {6} without retinue, unaccompanied, see अन्वय. {7} sudden, unexpected; <ls>U. 7.</ls>
